title: What scientific fields feature scientists that make research promises that regularly pay off? - Quora

response.answer_text: Very few, because ‘research promises’ are very rare. Most experiments are to test theory or learn more. We have to put research proposals together for our universities to get grant funding. Many in all areas thus won’t ‘pay off’.
